summary: Rebuild the existing daily coupon app as a true React Native + Firebase mobile app that can be packaged as an Android App Bundle (.aab) and prepared for Google Play Store release, preserving the current feature set (auth, daily coupon, history/redeem, brands, notifications, bottom-tab navigation).
architectural_notes: Backend: Firebase (Realtime DB/Firestore, Auth, Cloud Functions).
Navigation: bottom tab bar with sections Home, Coupons, Brands, Profile.
Data model should include user data, daily coupon codes, and brand information.
Backend endpoints/functions needed for auth, fetching daily coupons, and retrieving brand information.
Security: secure auth protocols and protect user data (encryption/secure handling).
Out of scope: advanced coupon usage analytics.
Out of scope: third-party shopping platform integrations for direct redemption.
Add Android release build pipeline: signing config + generation of Android App Bundle (.aab) suitable for Google Play Console distribution.

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity so users can sign in/out and the app can identify the current user by Principal.
Create a bottom navigation layout with four sections—Home, Coupons, Brands, Profile—matching the requested user flow and allowing navigation between these sections without losing auth state.
Implement the Home dashboard to fetch and display the current day’s coupon, including brand details and a clear call-to-action to copy the coupon code.
Implement coupon history (Past Coupons) so users can browse previously available coupons and view each coupon’s status (redeemed vs not redeemed).
Add coupon redeem functionality that lets a signed-in user mark a coupon as redeemed and prevents double-redeeming of the same coupon for that user.
Implement Featured Brands listing UI and backend support so users can browse brands offering coupons and optionally filter/search by brand name.
Implement an in-app notification experience to inform users when a new daily coupon is available (without relying on OS push notifications).
Apply a coherent, vibrant visual theme with clear typography and a mobile-first layout, and enforce it consistently across all screens.
Add the required generated images as static assets and use them in the UI (landing and/or navigation) without serving them via the backend.
Add Progressive Web App (PWA) support so the existing React web app can be installed on Android and desktop (home-screen install) without rebuilding as React Native.
Add required PWA icon assets to the frontend as static files and reference them from the web app manifest (do not serve icons via the backend).

Add a short in-repo README section explaining how to publicly share the deployed app URL and how to install it on Android as a PWA (Add to Home Screen), explicitly noting that Play Store upload requires a separate Android build outside this project.

new_feature_requests.summary: User authentication (email + social login) using Firebase Auth
Daily coupon giveaway: fetch and display the current day’s coupon code
Coupon management: view, copy, and redeem coupons; access past coupons
Brand listings: show featured brands offering coupons
Push notification system to alert users when a new daily coupon is available
App navigation & core screens: landing/login/signup, dashboard, past coupons, brands, profile with bottom tab bar
Add backend data models and query methods to support: featured brands, daily coupons (keyed by date), and per-user coupon redemption state.
Rebuild/prepare the app as a deployable React Native Android app (generate signed .aab) and set up steps for Google Play Store submission

projectName: Daily coupon giveaway web app with Internet Identity auth, coupon history, and brand listings
